item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Popular GitHub Action tj-actions/changed-files is compromised (81 points | 43 comments)
2. Google Being Forced to Sell Chrome Is Not Good for the Web (15 points | 8 comments)
3. Kerning, the Hard Way (135 points | 36 comments)
4. RubyLLM: A delightful Ruby way to work with AI (10 points | discuss)
5. Athena landed in a dark crater where the temperature was minus 280° F / 173° C (102 points | 158 comments)
6. Decrypting encrypted files from Akira ransomware using a bunch of GPUs (142 points | 25 comments)
7. Briar: Peer to Peer Encrypted Messaging (210 points | 77 comments)
8. New York Times shut down Tor Onion service (159 points | 90 comments)
9. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney who does work for YC and startups. AMA (202 points | 299 comments)
10. From QED to Neovim (11 points | 4 comments)

12. Samsung Q990D unresponsive after 1020 firmware update (539 points | 464 comments)
13. Why do transit agencies keep falling for the hydrogen bus myth? (122 points | 188 comments)
14. Apple will soon support encrypted RCS messaging with Android users (134 points | 68 comments)
15. A look at Firefox forks (217 points | 143 comments)
16. The curious surge of productivity in U.S. restaurants (46 points | 78 comments)

18. GCVR (YC W22) is hiring a lead technical artist ( | hide)
19. Show HN: Web Audio Spring-Mass Synthesis (14 points | 1 comment)
20. In S3 simplicity is table stakes (176 points | 121 comments)
21. Block Diffusion: Interpolating between autoregressive and diffusion models (106 points | 29 comments)
22. Rembrandt to Picasso: Five ways to spot a fake masterpiece (10 points | 4 comments)
23. An Egyptian Temple Reborn (9 points | discuss)
24. A 2FA app that tells you when you get `314159` (2024) (189 points | 87 comments)
25. Show HN: Open-Source MCP Server for Context and AI Tools (12 points | 4 comments)
26. Owl: Optimized Workforce Learning for multi-agent collaboration (27 points | 1 comment)
27. Show HN: OCR Benchmark Focusing on Automation (36 points | 18 comments)
28. 'Once in a Century' Proof Settles Math's Kakeya Conjecture (13 points | discuss)
29. Making Postgres scale (151 points | 122 comments)
30. The Internet of Beefs (2020) (30 points | 6 comments)
